message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $120. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $110.  It's a very fair price for what you're getting.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $85. Can you meet me at that price?
